quotes.message: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
quotes.name: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.message: Short cuts make long delays.
quotes.name: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.message: Mistakes are a part of being human. Appreciate your mistakes for what they are: precious life lessons that can only be learned the hard way.
quotes.name: Al Franken

quotes.message: Life is inherently risky. There is only one big risk you should avoid at all costs, and that is the risk of doing nothing.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: The hardest thing to learn in life is which bridge to cross and which bridge to burn.
quotes.name: David Russell

quotes.message: Don't let anyone ever make you feel like you don't deserve what you want.
quotes.name: Heath Ledger

quotes.message: To see the world, things dangerous to come to, to see behind walls, to draw closer, to find each other and to feel. That is the purpose of life.
quotes.name: The Secret Life Of Walter Mitty

quotes.message: We make a living by what we get. We make a life by what we give.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quotes.name: Robert Frost

quotes.message: Mistakes are part of the dues one pays for a full life.
quotes.name: Sophia Loren

quotes.message: In the long run, we shape our lives, and we shape ourselves. The process never ends until we die. And the choices we make are ultimately our own responsibility.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: Good judgment comes from experience, and experience comes from bad judgment.
quotes.name: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.message: At times you have to leave the city of your comfort and go into the wilderness of your intuition. What you ll discover will be wonderful. What you ll discover is yourself.
quotes.name: Alan Alda

quotes.message: If you don't design your own life plan, chances are you'll fall into someone else's plan. And guess what they have planned for you' Not much.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Experience is a hard teacher because she gives the test first, the lesson afterwards.
quotes.name: Vernon Saunders Law

quotes.message: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: And in the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Life is not measured by the number of breaths you take, but by every moment that takes your breath away.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Breathe. Let go. And remind yourself that this very moment is the only one you know you have for sure.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: The only real mistake is the one from which we learn nothing.
quotes.name: John Powell

quotes.message: No matter how hard you kick, no matter how high you get, you can't go all the way around.
quotes.name: John Green

quotes.message: But one of the big lessons I have learned from my journey is you can't please everyone, so don't try.
quotes.name: Chris Colfer

quotes.message: You can't wait around for something to become good, it either is, or isn't.
quotes.name: Toni Aleo

quotes.message: I am not someone who is ashamed of my past. I'm actually really proud. I know I made a lot of mistakes, but they, in turn, were my life lessons.
quotes.name: Drew Barrymore

quotes.message: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.name: Steve Jobs

quotes.message: You get in life what you have the courage to ask for.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: A great attitude becomes a great day which becomes a great month which becomes a great year which becomes a great life.
quotes.name: Mandy Hale

quotes.message: You can't live your life for other people. You've got to do what's right for you, even if it hurts some people you love.
quotes.name: The Notebook

quotes.message: We are who we choose to be.
quotes.name: Green Goblin

quotes.message: I made a resolve then that I was going to amount to something if I could. And no hours, nor amount of labor, nor amount of money would deter me from giving the best that there was in me. And I have done that ever since, and I win by it. I know.
quotes.name: Harland Sanders

quotes.message: I didn't get there by wishing for it or hoping for it, but by working for it.
quotes.name: Estee Lauder

quotes.message: I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I cannot accept not trying.
quotes.name: Michael Jordan

quotes.message: In every success story, you will find someone who has made a courageous decision.
quotes.name: Peter F. Drucker

quotes.message: If there are things you don't like in the world you grew up in, make your own life different.
quotes.name: Dave Thomas

quotes.message: Things turn out best for those who make the best of the way things turn out.
quotes.name: Jack Buck

quotes.message: Whenever you want to achieve something, keep your eyes open, concentrate and make sure you know exactly what it is you want. No one can hit their target with their eyes closed.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: Blessed is he who expects nothing, for he shall never be disappointed.
quotes.name: Alexander Pope

quotes.message: What to do with a mistake - recognize it, admit it, learn from it, forget it.
quotes.name: Dean Smith

quotes.message: Believe in yourself. Have faith in your abilities. Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: Don't let what you can't do stop you from doing what you can do.
quotes.name: John Wooden

quotes.message: Protect your spirit from contamination; limit your time with negative people.
quotes.name: Thema Davis

quotes.message: Remember that failure is an event, not a person.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
quotes.name: Dr. Seuss

quotes.message: The past has no power over the present moment.
quotes.name: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.message: Take chances, make mistakes. That's how you grow. Pain nourishes your courage. You have to fail in order to practice being brave.
quotes.name: Mary Tyler Moore

quotes.message: The more difficult the victory, the greater the happiness in winning.
quotes.name: Pele

quotes.message: If you fail to prepare, you're prepared to fail.
quotes.name: Mark Spitz Tap

quotes.message: Nothing fails like success.
quotes.name: Alan Watts

quotes.message: My advice to myself and to everyone else, particularly young people, is to turn on, tune in and drop out.
quotes.name: Timothy Leary

quotes.message: There is only one principle that can be defended under all circumstances and in all stages of human development. It is the principle: anything goes.
quotes.name: Paul Feyerabend

quotes.message: Does this path have a heart? If it does, the path is good; if it doesn’t, it is of no use. Both paths lead nowhere, but one has a heart, the other doesn’t. One makes for a joyful journey; as long as you follow it, you are one with it. The other will make you curse your life.
quotes.name: Carlos Castaneda

quotes.message: He who knows does not speak. He who speaks does not know.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: To win without fighting is best.
quotes.name: Sun Tzu

quotes.message: You cannot step into the same river twice.
quotes.name: Heraclitus

quotes.message: The path up and down is one and the same.
quotes.name: Heraclitus

quotes.message: The unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.name: Socrates

quotes.message: Who watches the watchmen?
quotes.name: Juvenal

quotes.message: Life is long if you know how to live it.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Life is perhaps most wisely regarded as a bad dream between two awakenings, and every day is a life in miniature.
quotes.name: Chu-Yin

quotes.message: Art and religion first; then philosophy; lastly science. That is the order of the great subjects of life, that’s their importance.
quotes.name: Murial Spark

quotes.message: The human crowd has been the lesson of my life. I can come to it with the born timidity of the poet, with the fear of the timid, but once I am in its midst, I feel transfigured. I am part of the essential majority, I am one more leaf on the great human tree.
quotes.name: Pablo Neruda

quotes.message: Everyone is your friend if you say yes, but say no and watch how they react. It's been a huge life lesson for me.
quotes.name: Hannah Simone

quotes.message: When you share your story and become vulnerable, the ripple effect and the people that you can help along the way is a life lesson.
quotes.name: Sophie Gregoire Trudeau

quotes.message: I think I've discovered the secret of life — you just hang around until you get used to it.
quotes.name: Charles Schulz

quotes.message: Life is an educational process you can't opt out of. You either learn the lesson, or you become the lesson.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: Life is a long lesson in humility.
quotes.name: James M. Barrie

quotes.message: Most things break, including hearts. The lessons of life amount not to wisdom, but to scar tissue and callus.
quotes.name: Wallace Stegner

quotes.message: The greatest lesson in life is to know that even fools are right sometimes.
quotes.name: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.message: The only thing experience teaches us is that experience teaches us nothing.
quotes.name: André Maurois

quotes.message: Experience is a good teacher, but she sends in terrific bills.
quotes.name: Minna Antrim

quotes.message: Many great actions are committed in small struggles.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: If you aren't going all the way, why go at all?
quotes.name: Joe Namath

quotes.message: Mountain, get out of my way.
quotes.name: Montel Williams

quotes.message: So many tremendous decisions in life are made because it is five o'clock.
quotes.name: Arthur Miller

quotes.message: For me, every hour is grace. And I feel gratitude in my heart each time I can meet someone and look at his or her smile.
quotes.name: Elie Wiesel

quotes.message: All of the events in your life are just one big experience, one big life lesson. Whether you consider the events of your life good or bad, they're both just life experiences. It's these experiences, which have shaped you as a person, and guide you along the journey of your life.
quotes.name: James A. Murphy

quotes.message: The lessons of your life are what allow you to live the life you have. Maybe your life isn't exactly what you expected. Maybe it hasn't turned out quite the way you thought it would. However, every lesson in your life has value.
quotes.name: James A. Murphy

quotes.message: I learned the most from the times of great difficulty in my life. These hard times were my teacher and from them I learned my most important lesson—give back.
quotes.name: Richard J. Chin

quotes.message: I find that when we really love and accept and approve of ourselves exactly as we are, then everything in life works.
quotes.name: Louise Hay

quotes.message: There are no mistakes, no coincidences. All events are blessings given to us to learn from.
quotes.name: Elisabeth Kübler-Ross

quotes.message: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Life is a test, a school where we come to learn and grow in our spiritual understanding and personal development, a school designed for each of us to reach our own unique destiny. Each of us is here to learn, to grow, to master the challenges that we face, and to expand our capacity for love and compassion. Taking life on with courage, trusting that we are meant to learn from every experience in life is why we are here.
quotes.name: Judy Tatelbaum

quotes.message: We are misled from early childhood to think that life is something you get through. Life is something to be in.
quotes.name: Dustin Hoffman

quotes.message: Learn lessons and live in the moment knowing you are mortal.
quotes.name: Bernie S. Siegel

quotes.message: Look to this Day! For it is Life, the very Life of Life.
quotes.name: Kalidasa

quotes.message: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
quotes.name: Jimmy Dean

quotes.message: The day you stop racing, is the day you win the race.
quotes.name: Bob Marley
